verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: has] been harassing Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals ( DACA ) recipient Daniel Ramirez Medina for over a year now , not only falsely claiming that he ’s a gang member , but also using that lie to justify ending his protections ....
